pages.text: Aur woh aapas mein kahenge “kya baat hai, hum un logon ko kahin nahin dekhte jinehin hum duniya mein bura samajte thay
Hunme yunhi unka mazaaq bana liya tha, ya woh kahin nazaron se ojhal hain?”
Beshak yeh baat sacchi hai, ehle dozakh mein yahi kuch jhagde honay waley hain
(Aey Nabi) insey kaho, “ main to bas khabardar kardene wala hoon. Koi haqeeqi mabood nahin magar Allah, jo yakta hai, sab par gaalib
Aasmaano aur zameen ka maalik aur un saari cheezon ka maalik jo inke darmiyan hain, zabardast aur darguzar karne wala”
Insey kaho “ yeh ek badi khabar hai
Jisko sunkar tum mooh pherte ho”
(Insey kaho) “Mujhey us waqt ki koi khabar na thi jab mala-e-aala (high council) mein jhagda ho raha tha
Mujhko to wahee (revelation/inspiration) ke zariye se yeh baatein sirf isliye batayi jaati hain ke main khula khula khabardar karne wala hoon”
Jab tere Rubb ne farishton se kaha “main mitti se ek bashar banane wala hoon
Phir jab main usey puri tarah bana doon aur usmein apni rooh phoonk doon to tum uske aagey sajde mein gir jao”
Is hukum ke mutaabiq farishtey sab ke sab sajde mein gir gaye
Magar Iblis ne apni badayi ka ghamand kiya aur woh kaafiron mein se ho gaya
Rubb ne farmaya “Aey Iblis, tujhey kya cheez usko sajda karne se maanay hui jisey maine apne dono haathon se banaya hai? Tu bada ban raha hai ya tu hai hi kuch unchey darje ki hastiyon mein se?”
Usne jawab diya “main ussey behtar hoon , aapne mujhko aag se paida kiya hai aur isko mitti se”
Farmaya “ accha to yahan se nikal ja , tu mardood hai
Aur tere upar yaum ul jaza tak meri laanat hai”
Woh bola “ aey mere Rubb , yeh baat hai to phir mujhey us waqt tak ke liye mohlat dey dey jab yeh log dobara uthaye jayenge”
Farmaya, “accha tujhey us roz tak ki mohlat hai
Jiska waqt mujhey maloom hai”
Usne kaha “ teri izzat ki kasam, main in sab logon ko behka kar rahunga
Bajuz tere un bandon ke jinhein tu nay khaalis karliya hai”
